description: The GraphCode represents that Maria is performing the activity of playing basketball. 'Maria' is identified as the subject (type 1: object), 'play' is an activity (type 4: activity), and 'basketball' is the object being played (type 1: object). The relationship between 'Maria' and 'play' is defined by the activity type (type 8: perform), and between 'play' and 'basketball' is the target of the activity (type 9: target). However, since these relations are not part of the identity mapping (identityMapping == false), they are not explicitly represented in the matrix. Only the diagonal values (identity types) are filled.
